data.name: Ho-Oh

attacks.name: Sacred Fire
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

data.flavorText: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind when it flies.

data.name: Lugia

attacks.name: Aeroblast
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

data.name: Pikachu

attacks.name: Recharge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Pikachu. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Pikachu.

data.flavorText: It occasionally uses an electric shock to recharge a fellow Pikachu that is in a weakened state.

data.name: Wobbuffet

abilities.name: Tenacious Bind
abilities.text: As long as Wobbuffet is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless more.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

data.name: Hoothoot
data.flavorText: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.

data.name: Noctowl

abilities.name: Night Scope
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy from your hand to 1 of your Water Pokémon. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Crunch
attacks.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Leaf Trans
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Grass Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Meganium is affected by a Special Condition.

abilities.name: Afterburner
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flare Destroy
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Latias

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Infinite Wind
attacks.text: If Latios is on your Bench, remove 2 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in down that refracts light to make it invisible.

data.name: Latios

abilities.name: Luster Float
abilities.text: If you have Latias in play, the Retreat Cost for Latios is 0.

attacks.name: Infinite Wing
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Latios.

data.flavorText: It understands human speech and is highly intelligent. It is a tender Pokémon that dislikes fighting.

data.name: Cleffa

abilities.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
abilities.text: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.

attacks.name: Eeeeeeek
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards. Cleffa is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

data.name: Smoochum

abilities.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
abilities.text: As long as Smoochum is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Smoochum by attacks.

attacks.name: Energy Antics
attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. Smoochum is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: Its lips are the most sensitive part of its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

data.name: Lapras

attacks.name: Ferry
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

data.flavorText: It ferries people across the sea on its back. It may sing an enchanting cry if it is in a good mood.

data.name: Shuckle

abilities.name: Fermenting Liquid
abilities.text: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to Shuckle, draw a card.

attacks.name: Shell Stunner
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shuckle by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: It stores berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

data.name: Plusle

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Plusle does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: It absorbs electricity from telephone poles. It shorts out its body to create crackling noises.

data.name: Minun

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tag Team Boost
attacks.text: If Plusle is on your Bench, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: Exposure to electricity from Minun and Plusle promotes blood circulation and relaxes muscles.

data.name: Tropical Tidal Wave
rules: Flip a coin. If heads, discard all Trainer and Stadium cards your opponent has in play. If tails, discard all Trainer and Stadium cards you have in play.

data.name: Raikou

attacks.name: Zap Cannon
attacks.text: During your next turn, Raikou can't use Zap Cannon.

data.flavorText: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

data.name: Entei

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.text: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Entei.

data.flavorText: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to contain its sheer power, it races headlong around the land.

data.name: Suicune

attacks.name: Sheer Cold
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

data.flavorText: Said to be the embodiment of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

data.name: Porygon

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Porygon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Version Update
attacks.text: Search your deck for Porygon2, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: It is a manmade Pokémon. Since it doesn't breathe, people are eager to try it in any environment..

data.name: Porygon2

abilities.name: Shortcut
abilities.text: The Retreat Cost for each Porygon, Porygon2, and Porygon-Z you have in play is Colorless less.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: Porygon2 does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: This upgraded version of Porygon is designed for space exploration. It can't fly, though.

data.name: Hitmonchan

attacks.name: Detect
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sky Uppercut
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

data.flavorText: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

data.name: Hitmonlee
data.flavorText: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.
